name: ast-copilot-helper
description: Monorepo for AST-based code analysis tools and MCP server

scripts.test:all: echo 'üß™ Running ALL tests (unit + integration + benchmarks + rust)...' && yarn run test && yarn run test:integration && yarn run test:benchmarks && yarn run test:rust:all
scripts.test:unit: echo 'üß™ Running essential unit tests (excluding performance tests)...' && vitest run tests/unit --exclude='**/performance/**' --reporter=default
scripts.test:rust:all: yarn run test:rust:check && yarn run test:rust:fmt && yarn run test:rust:clippy && yarn run test:rust
scripts.test:vector: echo 'üß™ Running vector database tests (performance benchmarks + WASM validation + regression detection)...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:vector:performance: echo '‚è±Ô∏è Running vector database performance benchmarks...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector/performance-benchmark.test.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:vector:wasm: echo 'üåê Running WASM vector database validation tests...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector/wasm-vector-database.test.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:vector:integration: echo 'üîó Running vector database integration tests...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector/integration.test.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:vector:regression: echo 'üìà Running vector database regression tests...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector/regression.test.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:vector:quick: echo '‚ö° Running vector database quick validation...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector --reporter=basic --run --exclude='**/performance-benchmark.test.ts'
scripts.test:vector:ci: echo 'ü§ñ Running vector database CI tests...' && vitest run packages/ast-helper/src/database/vector --reporter=json --outputFile=test-output/vector-results.json
scripts.test:performance: echo '‚ö° Running performance tests...' && yarn run test:benchmarks && yarn run test:vector:performance
scripts.test:performance:baseline: echo 'üìä Running performance baseline tests...' && (yarn run baseline:compare || (echo '‚ö†Ô∏è No baseline found, updating baselines...' && yarn run baseline:update))
scripts.baseline:update: echo 'üìä Updating performance baselines...' && tsx scripts/performance/baseline-update.ts
scripts.baseline:validate: echo '‚úÖ Validating performance baselines...' && tsx scripts/performance/baseline-validate.ts
scripts.baseline:compare: echo 'üîç Comparing performance against baselines...' && tsx scripts/performance/baseline-compare.ts
scripts.performance:dashboard: echo 'üìà Generating performance dashboard...' && tsx scripts/performance/dashboard-generate.ts
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --all --parallel --verbose run clean && rm -rf coverage test-output test-tmp *.log
scripts.clean:all: yarn run clean && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && npm install && npm run build
scripts.docs:deploy: cd docs && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.package:cli: cd packages/ast-helper && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.package:vscode: cd packages/vscode-extension && yarn build && yarn package
scripts.validate:build: yarn build && yarn typecheck && yarn test:unit
scripts.ci:validate-all: yarn run ci:validate && echo '‚úÖ All validation completed'
scripts.prepack: yarn run build && yarn run test:ci
scripts.release:dry: echo 'Dry run - would publish to npm'

author: EvanDodds
